title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Using Online Team-Based Learning (TBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course designed for real-time collaboration and project execution in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments, applying the effects of transitioning TBL structures to online language learning

learning_goals: Learners can complete language project tasks collaboratively with team members in an online Team-Based Learning (TBL) environment.
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in individual language expression assessments (iRA) using real-time video tools.
Learners perform clear role allocation and creative communication in team-based language presentation assessments (tRA).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
